casebody.data:
174 A.3d 503 JOSH WILLNER, AN INFANT BY HIS GUARDIAN AD LITEM, LESTER WILLNER, LESTER WILLNER, INDIVIDUALLY, AND AMY WILLNER, INDIVIDUALLY, PLAINTIFFS-RESPONDENTS, v. VERTICAL REALITY, AN ENTITY DOING BUSINESS IN THE STATE OF NEW JERSEY, AND VERTICAL REALITY MANUFACTURING, INC., AN ENTITY DOING BUSINESS IN THE STATE OF NEW JERSEY, DEFENDANTS, AND IVY LEAGUE CAMP, AN ENTITY DOING BUSINESS IN THE STATE OF NEW JERSEY, DEFENDANT, AND NUMATICS, INC., DEFENDANT-PETITIONER.

C-104 September Term 2017

079626 October 16, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003870-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
